main.name: Godwin Ogbodo
main.bio:
I'm a passionate frontend developer who is enthusiastic about building dynamic, interactive, and user-friendly web applications. I have a deep understanding of web development technologies, including NextJs, ReduxToolkit, Tailwind and JavaScript, and I'm always looking for ways to improve my skills and stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in frontend development. 
I'm  highly skilled in designing and developing responsive and accessible web interfaces that are intuitive and easy to use. I understand the importance of user experience, web technologies, and SEO principles and I'm dedicated to creating interfaces that are visually appealing, functional, and accessible to all users.

address.street: 8 moleye street, hughes ave. Yaba, Lagos State, 101245.

education.description: Obtained A National Diploma In Mechanical Engineering. Graduated with a GPA of 3.0.
